channel.title: Singleplayer Steam Workshop Questions
channel.description:
I've published a singleplayer map, but I have a couple questions here.
1. Is there any friendly way in Black Mesa itself for end-users to launch singleplayer maps? The Workshop Addons menu doesn't have any buttons for launching the level. Do they really have to enable and go to the console to launch a Workshop map?
2. How does one get to be in the "Singleplayer" subsection of the Steam Workshop?
Thanks.

item.title: Singleplayer Steam Workshop Questions
item.dc:creator: Fr0z3n
item.description:
Maki:

Yeah, I would have expected a tickbox as well, but I simply can’t find it anywhere. It’s definitely not part of the P2 upload tool either.

There’s only one Workshop item in Singleplayer, and it’s not even a Singleplayer map. There’s only one Multiplayer item as well, despite there being several MP maps… so either people are forgetting to do it, or they can’t find it. X)

You have to add it post publishing, iirc. Most people just post it and be done with it.

(I know because I’m that 1 MP cat’d map).
